verbs.description: ssm [ARG0: health] to [V: offer] [ARG1: free flu vaccinations] [ARGM-TMP: saturday] ssm health is hosting six free flu clinics throughout the st louis region on saturday october 13 2018 flu vaccinations will be available from 8 00am to noon at several locations and are open to those ages nine and older flu
